text:
Jof Davies has delivered structured internal training at MTDCNC across the following domains:

Camera and Filming:
- Training four MTDCNC staff in professional camera operation.
- Instruction in exposure, composition, colour balance, and shot sequencing.
- Demonstrating wireless AV systems and signal routing practices.

Editing:
- Teaching Premiere Pro fundamentals and advanced workflow optimisation.
- Coaching junior staff on timeline management, proxy workflows, and organisational structure.

CRM Systems:
- Training teams on FiveCRM, HubSpot, and Genie.AI.
- Educating stakeholders on deal flow, activity logging, list segmentation, and automation triggers.

Training focuses on practical competence, operational confidence, and reduced dependency on senior technical staff.
